Am I the only one or does the "init" part of the installer lasts forever?

1.  Much thanks for upload.

2.  No viruses - any indication of such can be ignored.

3.  Easy, quick install and patch (I installed over previous version on a 32-bit system.)

4.  No delay in initializing installer, but the first time (only) program was run, it took a long time to open.  (I was offline, if that mattered.)  Subsequent times (online), no inordinate delay.  

5.  The empty box with the blinking cursor that appears when you press patch is for your name.  (I wrote in a joke fake name - hehe, I'm so clever.)

6.  If you don't want to be reminded of any updates on startup (because you can't update this), then uncheck that option in the Tools/Options section.
Thanks for the upload. Works great on Windows 8 64bit. Had no problems what so ever. Fantastic job, appreciate your work.
